Entities.Name: Substance Use
Entities.Definition: Includes information on the usage of substances like alcohol, drugs, and tobacco, detailing the user's status, type, amount, frequency, and history.

Sample Data.Sentence: Patient smokes 2 packs of cigarettes daily for the past 8 years.
Sample Data.Annotated: Substance Use: Status: current, Type: cigarettes, Amount: 2 packs, Frequency: daily, Duration: for the past 8 years

Entities.Name: Employment
Entities.Definition: Information related to the patient's employment status, including type of occupation and employment history.

Sample Data.Sentence: Works as a nurse, has been unemployed for five years before.
Sample Data.Annotated: Employment: Status: employed, Type: nurse, History: unemployed for five years

Entities.Name: Living Status
Entities.Definition: Details regarding the patient's living arrangements, including with whom they reside and the duration of their current living situation.

Sample Data.Sentence: Lives with husband, has been living alone until a month ago.
Sample Data.Annotated: Living Status: Status: current, Type: with husband, History: lived alone until a month ago

Dataset.Name: Social History Annotation Corpus (SHAC)
Dataset.Details: Includes 4480 social history sections from clinical notes, with detailed annotations for various social determinants of health.

Annotation Guidelines.Description: The annotation guidelines and source code for the neural event extraction model are available at this GitHub repository.
